title: 7.5.2 Create YAML data files for 6 frameworks
body:
## Parent Issue
#33 - 7.5 Compliance Framework Mapping

## Objective
Create YAML data files for all 6 compliance frameworks.

## Frameworks
- HIPAA
- SOC 2
- PCI-DSS
- GDPR
- CIS Benchmarks
- NIST 800-53

## Structure
```yaml
framework:
  id: HIPAA
  name: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
  version: "2013"
domains:
  - code: "164.312"
    name: Technical Safeguards
    controls:
      - control_id: "164.312(a)(1)"
        name: Access Control
        ...
mappings:
  - rule_id: S3_001
    control: "164.312(a)(1)"
```

## Files to Create
- `data/compliance/frameworks/hipaa/controls.yaml`
- `data/compliance/frameworks/soc2/controls.yaml`
- `data/compliance/frameworks/pci-dss/controls.yaml`
- `data/compliance/frameworks/gdpr/controls.yaml`
- `data/compliance/frameworks/cis/controls.yaml`
- `data/compliance/frameworks/nist/controls.yaml`

## Estimated Time: 4 hours
